segments.text: You're not looking happy.What ' s the matter ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , nothing special . I'm just a bit tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With everything , with everybody , with all this !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A good suggestion for you.You need a holiday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It wasn't always like this , you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I mean.We always do the same thing.There ' s no variety in our lives .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You need a holiday.That ' s what's the matter .
segments.speaker: S1
